description:
Want to know how to start a Minecraft YouTube channel? This is the course for you! Together, we'll go over the basics of planning, creating, branding and sharing your videos, as well as taking a look a the channels of some of YouTube's most successful creators.

Starting a Minecraft YouTube channel can not only be fun but can also turn into a career. By implementing my tips & tricks into your launch plan, I believe you'll be well on your way to creating a channel that thrives.

This Minecraft YouTube channel course is organized into 6 sections:

  • Introduction
  • Planning
  • Creating
  • Branding
  • Sharing
  • Conclusion

By the end of this course, you'll know how to start a Minecraft YouTube channel and have the resources available to help it grow. Let's start creating awesome Minecraft YouTube channels and videos!
title: How To Start a Minecraft YouTube Channel
